function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The spread of SARS-CoV-2 through aerosolized water droplets from sink areas","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission in the built environment","Mitigation":"Remove items from sink areas and clean countertops with 10% bleach solution or alcohol-based cleaner","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building administrators, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Ineffective handwashing and hand sanitizing protocols","Impact":"Increased risk of microbial transmission and spread of undesirable pathogens","Mitigation":"Post signage about the effectiveness of handwashing, provide access to alcohol-based hand sanitizer, ensure soap dispensers are full, and implement routine surface cleaning protocols","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building administrators, maintenance staff"}]}
